thread.title: Excellent for Business Travellers
thread.title_full: Excellent for Business Travellers - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: apgoesplaces
title: Excellent for Business Travellers
text: Stayed in the hotel multiple times coming to business meetings in NYC. The hotel is fairly price if you consider similar hotels in Manhattan and is conveniently located in Midtown near MOMA and walking distance to central park. Rooms a decent size (considering this is NYC) and are very quiet offering good sleep quality. As an added bonus, a wifi is brazenly fast.
